name: habiLight
summary: A light color scheme with support of Vim 7 features
description:
This is a color scheme for light background. It can be used with Vim 6 and 7. It is based on nuvola from Johann Pfefferl (vimscript #719). I changed some colors and added support of punctuators, operators, vim 7 features like omni completion, spell checking...

Screenshot: http://www.habermann-net.de/img/screen/habiLight.png
install_details:
Copy this script into your local colors directory (~/.vim/colors/).

To support highlighting of C/C++ operators and punctuators as shown in the screenshot above download c.vim from http://www.habermann-net.de/files/after/syntax/c.vim
and copy it into your local after/syntax directory (~/.vim/after/syntax).
